pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPONE
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?l ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (in ?l ?c)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (type ?l ectoplasm)
        (cold ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (at ?l ?r))
        (type liquid1 liquid)
        (at liquid1 ?r)
        (in liquid1 ?c)
        (accessible liquid1)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ l }} swirls in the {{ c }} as it liquefies.

pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPTWO
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?i - ingredient ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at liquid1 ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (at ?i ?r)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (cold ?c)
        (type ?i nightshade)
        (in ?i ?c)
        (in liquid1 ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (type liquid1 liquid))
        (not (at liquid1 ?r))
        (not (in liquid1 ?c))
        (not (accessible liquid1))

        (not (at ?i ?r))
        (not (in ?i ?c))
        (not (type ?i nightshade))

        (type liquid2 liquid)
        (at liquid2 ?r)
        (in liquid2 ?c)
        (accessible liquid2)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ i }} is absorbed into the {{ l }} in the {{ c }} with a hiss.

pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPTHREE
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?i - ingredient ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at liquid2 ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (at ?i ?r)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (cold ?c)
        (type ?i spideregg)
        (in ?i ?c)
        (in liquid2 ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (type liquid2 liquid))
        (not (at liquid2 ?r))
        (not (in liquid2 ?c))
        (not (accessible liquid2))

        (not (at ?i ?r))
        (not (in ?i ?c))
        (not (type ?i spideregg))

        (type liquid3 liquid)
        (at liquid3 ?r)
        (in liquid3 ?c)
        (accessible liquid3)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ i }} is absorbed into the {{ l }}, which briefly bubbles in the {{ c }}.

pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPFOUR
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at liquid3 ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (cold ?c)
        (in liquid3 ?c)
        (ladlestirred liquid3)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (type liquid3 liquid))
        (not (at liquid3 ?r))
        (not (in liquid3 ?c))
        (not (ladlestirred liquid3))
        (not (accessible liquid3))

        (type liquid4 liquid)
        (at liquid4 ?r)
        (in liquid4 ?c)
        (accessible liquid4)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ l }} in the {{ c }} produces a puff of pink vapor.

pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPFIVE
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?i - ingredient ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at liquid4 ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (at ?i ?r)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (cold ?c)
        (type ?i plinklecrystal)
        (in ?i ?c)
        (in liquid4 ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (type liquid4 liquid))
        (not (at liquid4 ?r))
        (not (in liquid4 ?c))
        (not (accessible liquid4))

        (not (at ?i ?r))
        (not (in ?i ?c))
        (not (type ?i plinklecrystal))

        (type potion1 liquid)
        (at potion1 ?r)
        (in potion1 ?c)
        (accessible potion1)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ l }} in the {{ c }} produces a puff of pink vapor, finishing the potion.
